sn36.11:1.1: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn36.11:1.2: “idha mayhaṃ, bhante, rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi—
sn36.11:1.4: Sukhā vedanā, dukkhā vedanā, adukkhamasukhā vedanā—
sn36.11:1.8: Kiṃ nu kho etaṃ bhagavatā sandhāya bhāsitaṃ:
sn36.11:2.2: Tisso imā, bhikkhu, vedanā vuttā mayā.
sn36.11:2.3: Sukhā vedanā, dukkhā vedanā, adukkhamasukhā vedanā—
sn36.11:2.7: Taṃ kho panetaṃ, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhārānaṃyeva aniccataṃ sandhāya bhāsitaṃ:
sn36.11:2.9: Taṃ kho panetaṃ, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhārānaṃyeva khayadhammataṃ …pe…
sn36.11:2.15: Atha kho pana, bhikkhu, mayā anupubbasaṅkhārānaṃ nirodho akkhāto.
sn36.11:2.16: Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa vācā niruddhā hoti.
sn36.11:2.17: Dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa vitakkavicārā niruddhā honti.
sn36.11:2.18: Tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa pīti niruddhā hoti.
sn36.11:2.19: Catutthaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa assāsapassāsā niruddhā honti.
sn36.11:2.24: Saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpannassa saññā ca vedanā ca niruddhā honti.
sn36.11:2.25: Khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno rāgo niruddho hoti, doso niruddho hoti, moho niruddho hoti.
sn36.11:2.26: Atha kho, bhikkhu, mayā anupubbasaṅkhārānaṃ vūpasamo akkhāto.
sn36.11:2.27: Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa vācā vūpasantā hoti.
sn36.11:2.28: Dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa vitakkavicārā vūpasantā honti …pe…
sn36.11:2.29: saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpannassa saññā ca vedanā ca vūpasantā honti.
sn36.11:2.30: Khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno rāgo vūpasanto hoti, doso vūpasanto hoti, moho vūpasanto hoti.
sn36.11:2.32: Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa vācā paṭippassaddhā hoti.
sn36.11:2.33: Dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa vitakkavicārā paṭippassaddhā honti.
sn36.11:2.34: Tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa pīti paṭippassaddhā hoti.
sn36.11:2.35: Catutthaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa assāsapassāsā paṭippassaddhā honti.
sn36.11:2.36: Saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpannassa saññā ca vedanā ca paṭippassaddhā honti.
sn36.11:2.37: Khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno rāgo paṭippassaddho hoti, doso paṭippassaddho hoti, moho paṭippassaddho hotī”ti.
